des: "This recipe makes enough for a large party. The tofu makes the hummus mild and creamy. Add as much garlic as you like!"
ins: Mince garlic in the large bowl of a food processor.  Add garbanzo beans, tofu, lemon juice, parsley, and tahini; blend until smooth.  Add ginger, cayenne pepper, and tamari; blend.  Season to taste with salt and black pepper.  Blend in water if  hummus is too thick.
